title: Durga Saptashati
author: Ved Vyasa
description: Seven hundred verses glorifying the Divine Mother, recounting her victories over demonic forces.

title: Ramayana
author: Valmiki
description: The epic tale of Lord Rama's journey, his exile, and the victory of dharma over adharma. A story of devotion, courage, and righteousness.

title: Shiva Purana
author: Ved Vyasa
description: Ancient texts describing the glory of Lord Shiva, his manifestations, and the path to liberation through devotion.

title: Hanuman Chalisa
author: Tulsidas
description: Forty verses in praise of Lord Hanuman, offering strength, courage, and protection to devotees.

title: Bhagavad Gita
author: Ved Vyasa
description: The eternal dialogue between Lord Krishna and Arjuna on the battlefield of Kurukshetra. A timeless guide to dharma, karma, and spiritual wisdom.

title: Vishnu Sahasranama
author: Ved Vyasa
description: Thousand names of Lord Vishnu, each revealing a divine attribute and aspect of the Supreme Being.

title: Bhagavad Gita As It Is
author: A. C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada
description: A detailed commentary on the Bhagavad Gita, offering deeper insights into the text and its teachings.

title: The Ramacharitmanas
author: Tulsidas
description: An epic retelling of the life and exploits of Lord Rama, revered as one of the most important texts in the Hindu tradition.

title: Vedas: The Eternal Wisdom
author: Various Authors
description: A collection of hymns and philosophies from the Vedas, offering profound spiritual wisdom and insights into the ancient Indian way of life.

title: Katha Upanishad
author: Naciketas
description: A conversation between the sage Naciketas and Yama, the God of Death, that explores the nature of life, death, and the self.

title: Ashtavakra Gita
author: Ashtavakra
description: A dialogue between the sage Ashtavakra and King Janaka, expounding the nature of the self and the path to enlightenment.

title: The Upanishads
author: Various Authors
description: A collection of ancient texts exploring spiritual knowledge, meditation, and the ultimate reality of the universe.

title: Sri Durga Stotra
author: Adi Shankaracharya
description: A hymn in praise of Goddess Durga, invoking her protection and blessings for peace and prosperity.

title: Yoga Sutras of Patanjali
author: Patanjali
description: A foundational text of yoga philosophy, detailing the path to spiritual growth, mental discipline, and self-realization.

title: Maha Shivaratri: The Night of Shiva
author: Various Authors
description: A collection of hymns, stories, and teachings related to Lord Shiva and the significance of Maha Shivaratri.

title: Tulsidas Ramayana
author: Tulsidas
description: A detailed and devotional retelling of the Ramayana by the saint-poet Tulsidas, revered across India.

title: Sankhya Karika
author: Ishvarakrishna
description: A foundational text of Sankhya philosophy, explaining the nature of the universe, the self, and the path to liberation.

title: Vedic Mathematics
author: Jagadguru Swami Sri Bharati Krishna Tirthaji Maharaja
description: An introduction to Vedic Mathematics, a system of mathematics based on ancient Indian texts that simplifies calculations.
